purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of

aa.refpath: manifold_subsurface_shape_representation <= shape_representation <= representation <- representation_relationship.rep_2 {representation_relationship.name = `parent surface'} representation_relationship.rep_1 -> representation => shape_representation => manifold_subsurface_shape_representation

manifold_subsurface_shape_representation <= shape_representation <= representation <- representation_relationship.rep_2 {representation_relationship.name = `parent surface'} representation_relationship.rep_1 -> representation => {representation representation.name = `open shell based surface'} shape_representation => manifold_surface_shape_representation
